docs.title: Mr.Penguino Docs
docs.text:
Welcome to the documentation for my awesome Discord bot!

In this documentation, I will be going over all of the commands that I have created over the years with my old AND faithful companion, Mr.Penguino ^^

docs.title: Features
docs.text:
• AI moderation
  • Auto moderation
  • Reaction roles
  • Temp bans
  • User warnings
  • Appeals system

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text:
• Invite the bot to your server
  • Use /help to see available commands
